statements: SELECT * FROM device_authentication_logs
SELECT log_id, timestamp, event_type FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, timestamp, success FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE event_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM device_authentication_logs
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_success_logs FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE success = TRUE GROUP BY device_id
SELECT * FROM device_authentication_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM device_authentication_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT user_id, event_type, timestamp FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, event_type, COUNT(*) AS login_attempts FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE event_type = 'Login' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY login_attempts DESC
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM device_authentication_logs
SELECT * FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT username, timestamp FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_attempts FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE IP_address = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE reason LIKE '%intrusion%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, username, status FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM device_authentication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, username, status FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE username LIKE 'admin%' AND status = 'success' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, timestamp FROM device_authentication_logs WHERE status = 'failed' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM device_authentication_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_logs > 5 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceAuthenticationLogs;
SELECT device_name, authentication_status FROM DeviceAuthenticationLogs ORDER BY authentication_time DESC;
SELECT authentication_status, authentication_method FROM DeviceAuthenticationLogs WHERE device_name = 'Mobile Phone';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_breaches FROM SecurityBreaches;
SELECT device_id, attempt_timestamp, attempt_ip_address FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts ORDER BY attempt_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceAuthenticationLogs;
SELECT device_name, authentication_status FROM DeviceAuthenticationLogs WHERE authentication_status = true;
SELECT device_name, authentication_time FROM DeviceAuthenticationLogs ORDER BY authentication_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, authentication_method FROM DeviceAuthenticationLogs WHERE authentication_method = 'Biometric' ORDER BY authentication_time ASC;
SELECT dal.device_name, sa.breach_type FROM DeviceAuthenticationLogs AS dal JOIN SecurityBreaches AS sa ON dal.id = sa.device_id ORDER BY sa.breach_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_name, device_owner FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, attempt_timestamp, success FROM access_attempts WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY attempt_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE event_type = 'error';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_owner FROM devices JOIN access_attempts ON devices.device_id = access_attempts.device_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_attempts FROM access_attempts WHERE success = true GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs;
SELECT username, authentication_time, ip_address FROM authentication_logs WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM device_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE username='admin' ORDER BY authentication_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type='mobile' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' AND username='john_doe';
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM device_users WHERE device_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, username, attempt_time FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE failure_reason='Incorrect password' ORDER BY attempt_time DESC LIMIT 5;
